help.entry:
VNUM
Usage: vnum <mob | obj> <name>
Gives a list of the virtual numbers of objects or mobiles which have the specified name.
Examples:
> vnum obj ring 1. [ 904] a platinum ring 2. [ 2543] a seashell ring 3. [ 2588] a small emerald ring
> vnum mob dragon 1. [ 1] Puff 2. [ 908] the dragon turtle 3. [ 2548] the Master of Illusions
